channel.title: 3MinuteUpdate - Most recent videos - Dailymotion
channel.description:
Take a 3 minute break, we'll give you the latest breaking news and everything you need to know in Entertainment, Fashion, Sports, Business, Technology and Gaming!

From who’s dating who in Hollywood to the most exciting games right down to the buzzer. Any time day or night, get 3 minute “updated” on the latest trending news!
channel.itunes:subtitle: Dailymotion - 3MinuteUpdate's Most Recent Videos
channel.itunes:summary:
